data.title: Shows A-Z - lying game, the on abc family
data.text:
view all related dvds | view all related news | view all related listings

[03/06/15 - 11:49 PM]

Development Update: Friday, March 6

Updates include: Mark-Paul Gosselaar cast in "People Are Talking" at NBC; Joy Bryant, Coby Bell among latest cast in ABC's "The Advocate"; and Alexandra Chando tapped for role in The CW's "Dead People."

[01/11/14 - 08:12 PM]

It's Back to School for Kristy Swanson in "A Lesson in Love" a Hallmark Channel Original Movie World Premiere, April 12

Along with Swanson, Scott Grimes, Paul Butcher and Allie Gonino test if the family who goes to school together, stays together.

[11/27/13 - 11:18 PM]

Development Update: Wednesday, November 27

Updates include: ABC Family gives back-seven order to "Chasing Life"; Kirk Acevedo boards Syfy's "12 Monkeys"; and Barbara Hershey to visit ABC's "Once Upon a Time in Wonderland."

[07/22/13 - 03:21 PM]

It's Official: ABC Family Cancels "Bunheads"

The news comes exactly one week after the cable channel axed fellow bubble series "The Lying Game."

[07/15/13 - 09:41 AM]

Chando: ABC Family Has Canceled "The Lying Game"

The actress broke said news via her Twitter page this morning.

[07/08/13 - 07:10 PM]

Q2 in Review: How 436 Original Primetime Cable Series Fared in the Ratings

A recap of the ratings to date through the second quarter of 2013.

[04/19/13 - 11:16 PM]

Development Update: Friday, April 19

Updates include: ABC Family still mulling future of "The Lying Game"; Showtime open to "Dexter" spin-off; and NBC pulls "Hannibal" episode over content concerns.

[04/02/13 - 06:07 PM]

Q1 in Review: How 280 Original Primetime Cable Series Fared in the Ratings

A recap of the ratings to date for the first quarter of 2013.

[03/22/13 - 11:02 PM]

Development Update: Friday, March 22

Updates include: Carla Gugino to have "Doubt" at ABC; Zoe Lister-Jones joins CBS's "Friends with Better Lives"; and VH1 extends "The Jenny McCarthy Show."

[03/13/13 - 02:37 PM]

"Pretty Little Liars" Is Tuesday's #1 TV Telecast in Women 18-34 and #1 for the 10th Week a Row in Females 12-34

ABC Family spins the numbers for Tuesday, March 12.

[03/12/13 - 02:01 PM]

Video: A Few Minutes With... "The Lying Game" Co-Stars Charisma Carpenter & Alexandra Chando

Check out our visit with two of the stars from ABC Family's drama.

[03/06/13 - 02:18 PM]

ABC Family's "Pretty Little Liars" Is Tuesday's #1 TV Telecast for 9th Consecutive Week in Target Females 12-34

ABC Family spins the numbers for Tuesday, March 5.

[02/27/13 - 02:04 PM]

ABC Family's "Pretty Little Liars" Is Tuesday's #1 TV Telecast in Females 12-34 and "Most Tweeted" TV Series for 8th Straight Week

ABC Family spins the numbers for Tuesday, February 26.

[02/21/13 - 09:54 AM]

"Pretty Little Liars" Is Tuesday's #1 TV Telecast for the 7th Straight Week in Females 12-34

ABC Family spins the numbers for Tuesday, February 19.

[02/13/13 - 03:38 PM]

"Pretty Little Liars" Garners More Tweets and Uniques; "The Lying Game" Sees Week to Week Gains Virtually Across the Board

ABC Family spins the numbers for Tuesday, February 12.

[02/06/13 - 02:23 PM]

"Pretty Little Liars" is Tuesday's #1 TV Telecast for the 5th Straight Week in Females 12-34

ABC Family spins the numbers for Tuesday, February 5.

[01/31/13 - 05:46 AM]

MTV Names Mina Lefevre Head of Scripted Programming

Lefevre had been with ABC Family since its inception and was behind the network's highest-rated hits, including "Pretty Little Liars."

[01/30/13 - 02:51 PM]

ABC Family's "Pretty Little Liars" is Tuesday's "Most Social" TV Program; #1 TV Telecast for 4th Straight Week in Females 12-34

ABC Family spins the numbers for Tuesday, January 29.

[01/24/13 - 10:54 AM]

ABC Family's "Pretty Little Liars" is Tuesday's #1 TV Telecast in Women 18-34 and Target Millennials

ABC Family spins the numbers for Tuesday, January 22.

[01/16/13 - 02:12 PM]

ABC Family's "Pretty Little Liars" is Tuesday's #1 TV Telecast in Females 12-34 for 2nd Straight Week

ABC Family spins the numbers for Tuesday, January 15.

[01/09/13 - 03:41 PM]

ABC Family's "Pretty Little Liars" Returns as TV's #1 Show in Key Demos; Accounts for Over 52% of All Tuesday TV Twitter Posts

ABC Family spins the numbers for Tuesday, January 8.

[01/07/13 - 10:59 AM]

"Pretty Little Liars" Fans Get a Surprise from Mona During All New Episodes of "Pretty Little Liars" and "The Lying Game" on Tuesday, January 8th on ABC Family

Fans will need to decode Mona's tweets to unlock a secret video featuring footage not seen in the premiere episode.

[01/03/13 - 11:54 AM]

ABC Family Presents "Tweetapalooza!," a Two-Night Social Media Event Featuring ABC Family Stars Tweeting Live with Fans During Their Premieres

Gilles Marini, Sutton Foster, Keegan Allen and Alexandra Chando are among those participating.

[01/03/13 - 10:41 AM]

ABC Family Earns Historic #1 Prime Ranking Across All Cable in 2012 in Females 12-34; #1 Year Ever in Target Women

ABC Family spins the numbers for the year to date.

[12/03/12 - 10:38 AM]

ABC Family's "Night of Lies" Returns with the Midseason Premiere of "Pretty Little Liars" and the Season Two Premiere of "The Lying Game" Airing Tuesday, January 8

An all-day "Pretty Little Liars" marathon will lead into said premieres.

[12/03/12 - 10:36 AM]

Celebrate ABC Family's 25 Days of Christmas with 25 Days of Holiday Fun Online

Highlights include dxclusive music downloads with holiday songs from "Pretty Little Liars" star Tyler Blackburn.

[10/22/12 - 07:55 AM]

ABC Family Sets Premiere Dates for Its Hit Returning Series All Premiering in January

"Switched at Birth" and "Bunheads" return Monday, January 7 followed by "Pretty Little Liars" and "The Lying Game" on Tuesday, January 8.

[08/17/12 - 12:59 PM]

ABC Family Cancels "Jane by Design" Amid Slew of Renewals

"Jane" and the recently wrapped "Make It or Break It" are the network's least-watched scripted series this year.

[07/17/12 - 11:09 PM]

Development Update: Tuesday, July 17

Updates include: Ty Olsson to recur on The CW's "Supernatural"; Ronald D. Moore to develop series based on the "Outlander" novels; and Ryan Rottman to drop by ABC Family's "The Lying Game."

[07/10/12 - 11:00 AM]

Charisma Carpenter Joins the Cast of the Hit Drama Series "The Lying Game"

The second season of the drama series begins production this month for a winter premiere.

[06/19/12 - 11:22 PM]

Development Update: Tuesday, June 19

Updates include: Jeff Pinkner to depart FOX's "Fringe"; Brian Dietzen promoted to series regular on "NCIS"; and TNT passes on its Tricia Helfer-led drama pilot "Scent of the Missing."

[06/11/12 - 06:02 AM]

Complete Previous Seasons of "Pretty Little Liars" and "The Lying Game" Coming Exclusively to Netflix

Season one of "Liars" is available to watch instantly now while season two will be available on July 3.

[05/02/12 - 12:21 PM]

"Political Animals" to Anchor USA Network Summer Lineup - Six-Hour Event Drama Premieres Sunday, July 15, at 10/9c

Plus: Adrian Pasdar has been cast as President Paul Garcetti in the project.

[04/24/12 - 12:21 PM]

ABC Family Greenlights a Second Season of the Hit Drama Series "The Lying Game"

The new season will begin production this summer for a winter premiere.

[04/10/12 - 11:11 PM]

Q1 in Review/Q2 in Preview: A&E, ABC Family, AMC, Animal Planet, BET, Bravo & Cartoon Network

A look at what's ahead on the cable channels, plus a recap of their ratings to date this year.

[03/27/12 - 12:00 PM]

1Q 2012 is ABC Family's Biggest 1Q Ever in Key Demos in Prime

ABC Family spins the numbers for the quarter to date.

[03/20/12 - 10:01 AM]

Hallmark Channel Finds Its Pot of Gold With Original Movie, "Chasing Leprechauns"

The Hallmark Channel spins the numbers for Saturday, March 17.

[03/14/12 - 11:49 PM]

Development Update: Wednesday, March 14

Updates include: Jenna Elfman to play First Lady in NBC's "1600 Penn"; Scott Wolf reports to The CW's "Dakota"; and Hamish Linkalter bound for FOX's "The Asset."

[02/28/12 - 11:32 AM]

ABC Family is Cable's #2 Network in Females 12-34 for the 2nd Straight Month

ABC Family spins the numbers for the month of February.

[02/09/12 - 03:08 PM]

Adrian Pasdar Finds More Than Luck and Love on the Emerald Isle in "Chasing Leprechauns," A Hallmark Channel Original Movie World Premiere March 17

Amy Huberman co-stars in the film, from director Kevin Connor and writer Rod Spence.

[01/31/12 - 10:04 AM]

ABC Family Posts Biggest January Ever; "Pretty Little Liars" is Cable #1 Scripted Series Across Core Females

ABC Family spins the numbers for the month of January.

[01/24/12 - 02:40 PM]

"Pretty Little Liars" is Monday's #1 TV Telecast in Females 12-34 and Female Teens

ABC Family spins the numbers for Monday, January 23.

[01/18/12 - 03:09 PM]

ABC Family's "The Lying Game" Scores Series Highs for the 3rd Consecutive Week

ABC Family spins the numbers for Monday, January 16.

[01/11/12 - 09:36 AM]

"Pretty Little Liars" Ranks as Monday's #1 Scripted TV Telecast in Women 18-34, Viewers 12-34 and Females 12-34

ABC Family spins the numbers for Monday, January 9.

[01/05/12 - 09:00 AM]

2011 Ratings Recap: Cable's Scripted Dramas - What's Up? What's Down? What's on Top?

Find out how cable's 67 scripted dramas fared this past year.

[01/04/12 - 03:26 PM]

ABC Family's "Pretty Little Liars" Returns Strong; "The Lying Game" Hits Series Highs

ABC Family spins the numbers for Monday, January 2.

[01/03/12 - 10:34 AM]

Continue Celebrating the New Year as SOAPnet Broadcasts First 10 Episodes of "The Lying Game" Sunday, January 8 from 10AM - 9PM ET/PT

The new season's winter premiere episode will also be broadcast as part of the 11-hour stunt.

[12/21/11 - 10:02 AM]

Ring in the New Year With the First 10 Episodes of "The Lying Game" on Sunday, January 1 from 9AM-7PM on ABC Family

The show's winter season kicks off the following night at 9:00/8:00c.

[11/28/11 - 10:35 AM]

ABC Family's Original Series "Pretty Little Liars" and "The Lying Game" Return With All New Episodes Starting on Monday, January 2nd

The cable channel further details the upcoming seasons of its original series.

[11/03/11 - 10:38 AM]

ABC Family Sets Premiere Dates for Its 2012 January Line Up

"Pretty Little Liars" and "The Lying Game" return Monday, January 2 while newcomer "Jane By Design" joins "Switched at Birth" on Tuesday, January 3.

[11/02/11 - 11:04 PM]

Development Update: Wednesday, November 2

Updates include: "Family Feud" cleared through the 2014-15 season; Michael Rispoli, Robert Costanzo join ABC's "The Manzanis"; and FOX's "Alcatraz" set for one to two weeks of reshoots.

[10/26/11 - 08:31 AM]

New Millennial Focused Channel, ABC Spark, to Launch in Canada

The network, due to kick off this spring, will feature the likes of ABC Family's "The Secret Life of the American Teenager" and "Switched at Birth."

[09/16/11 - 10:22 AM]

ABC Family Greenlights An Additional Season of "Make It or Break It" and Gives A Back-Order Pick-Up of "The Lying Game"

Plus: the network announced development of four new pilots, dramas "Bunheads" and "Intercept," and comedies "Baby Daddy" and "Village People."

[09/15/11 - 10:55 PM]

Development Update: Thursday, September 15

Updates include: "Lying Game" in, "Chloe King" out at ABC Family; FOX gives "Bones" four extra episodes; and Mark Gordon to bring a small screen take on "Source Code" to CBS.

[08/30/11 - 11:12 AM]

ABC Family Sizzles to Record Levels in Prime in Summer 2011

ABC Family spins the numbers for the summer to date.

[08/15/11 - 09:02 AM]

Platinum-Selling New Zealand Pop Band Goldenhorse Make Their U.S. Debut on ABC Family's "The Lying Game"

Smartphone users can go to ABCFamily.com and get their song "Jump Into the Sun" for free in the next 24 hours.

[08/15/11 - 12:15 AM]

Interview: "The Lying Game" Executive Producer Gina Girolamo

ABC Family's latest teen drama, based on the books by Sara Shepard, launches tonight at 9:00/8:00c.

[08/12/11 - 02:20 PM]

ABC Family's "Secret Life" to Wrap 24-Week Run on September 5, "Lying Game" to Get Earlier Slot in Fall

The channel's flagship drama has aired every Monday since March 28.

[07/13/11 - 10:08 PM]

Development Update: Wednesday, July 13

Updates include: Jesse Spencer locks in "House" return; Kal Penn to recur on CBS's "How I Met Your Mother"; and Rick Malambri to play "The Lying Game" for ABC Family.

[07/05/11 - 10:56 PM]

Development Update: Tuesday, July 5

Updates include: NBC's "Chelsea" cuts three actors; FOX's "Breaking In" still alive through November 15; and Elizabeth Hurley books role on The CW's "Gossip Girl."

[07/05/11 - 10:51 AM]

The Drama and Deception Is Doubled in the New ABC Family Original Series, "The Lying Game," Premiering on Monday, August 15th at 9:00 PM ET/PT

Alexandra Chando toplines the series, based on the novels of the same name.

[06/30/11 - 10:06 AM]

Seventeen Magazine and ABC Family Kick Off Pro-Social Movement to Delete Digital Drama

Delete Digital Drama will be the focus of Seventeen magazine's August issue, available on newsstands on July 5.

[02/22/11 - 08:33 AM]

ABC Family Picks Up "The Lying Game"

The newcomer joins recent pickups "The Nine Lives of Chloe King," "Switched at Birth" and "The Great State of Georgia."

[02/18/11 - 10:26 PM]

Development Update: Friday, February 18

Updates include: Tim Allen locks into ABC's "Last Days of Man"; Rob Corddry has "Little in Common" with FOX; and "Lone Star's" Jimmy Wolk reports to "Georgetown" at ABC.

[11/24/10 - 06:21 PM]

Development Update: Wednesday, November 24

Updates include: Andie MacDowell asks "What Would Jane Do" at ABC Family; Rhea Seehorn joins TNT's "Rabbit Factory"; and Bird York is "In Deep" with FOX.

[11/22/10 - 06:45 PM]

Development Update: Monday, November 22

Updates include: Jorge Garcia first to land on FOX's "Alcatraz"; CMT renews "The Singing Bee"; and Miranda Otto books "Locke & Key" at FOX.

[11/01/10 - 06:44 PM]

Development Update: Monday, November 1

Updates include: ABC's "Off the Map" gets a premiere date; Ally Walker reports to Lifetime's "Exit 19"; and Christine Adams joins "Terra Nova."

[10/18/10 - 06:37 PM]

Development Update: Monday, October 18

Updates include: ABC cuts "V" to 10 episodes; USA may revive WWE's "Tough Enough"; and Comedy Central cancels "Important Things With Demetri Martin."
